name: Spark
description: Spark is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With its vibrant orange box, classic buttons, and sleek foundry arms and legs, Spark stands out among its robotic peers. The screen of Spark features a playful cat design, adding a touch of whimsy to its appearance. To complete its look, Spark is equipped with stylish shades as an add-on. As a member of the WebtrES club, Spark is programmed with advanced abilities and skills to navigate the digital realm and assist its human counterparts.
